attributes.action: change the foreign language motto that appears on the official coat of arms of the United Kingdom to something that better reflects the language, character and aspirations of its people.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Instead of the French maxim "honi soit qui mal y pense" the United Kingdom should adopt as its motto the phrase "come and have a go if you think you're hard enough" .
